property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverses any Strike, Grapple, Submission or High Risk maneuver and ends your opponent's turn. if played from your hand you may draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your next card can not be reversed. Draw 1 card.

card.name: Do You Smell What The Rock is Cookin?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your next CARD can not be reversed. Draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw 1 card. When this card is in your Ring area and an opponent forces you to discard a card, you may instead place this card back into your hand instead of discarding

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 5D or greater maneuver. If reversed from your opponent's hand, discard 3 cards.

card.name: Really Going for a Cheap Pop

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard up to 3 cards from your hand, then draw the same number of cards you discarded. If played in Columbus, OH at Origins you may discard up to 4 cards instead of 3 cards

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 3 cards and your opponent draws up to 3 cards.

property.name: SS Logos
property.value: Hulk Hogan, Ric Flair, Hall and Nash, Trish Stratus, Tajiri, Hurricane, Al Snow, Billy and Chuck

property.name: Card Text
property.value: At the end of the Pre-match phase, if your Superstar opponent is not on this card, he must randomly discard 1 card from his Backlash deck to his Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed if the card titled Really Going For the Cheap Pop! is in your Ring area. Look at your opponent's Backlash deck. If played in Colombus, Ohio at Origins, your opponent must also discard 1 card from his hand. When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent cannot play any cards with the word 'cheap' in the title.

card.name: Why the Hell Are We Back?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when there is a card with the word 'hell' in the title in your Ring area. Put 1 Backlash deck card from your Ringside pile into your Backlash deck. When this card is in your Ring area, your opponent cannot play any card with the word 'why' in the title.'

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, before your Draw Segment, you must overturn the top 2 cards from your Arsenal into your Ringside pile. Put all Maneuver cards overturned in this manner into your hand. If none of the overturned cards are Maneuever cards, put this card into your Ringside pile.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played if your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating and if you have fewer Reversal cards in your Ring Area than your opponent. When played from your hand, reverse any maneuver and end your opponent's turn. Your opponent discards # cards, where # is equal to the number of Reversal cards your opponent has in his Ring Area more than you.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to # cards with the words 'cheap pop' in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand, where # is equal to the number of cards in your Ring area with the words 'cheap pop' in the title. Your opponent puts up to # cards with the words 'cheap pop' in the title from his Ringside pile into his hand, where # is equal to the number of cards in his Ring area with the words 'cheap pop' in the title. When played in Columbia, OH at Origins, you may shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

card.name: Why the Hell Are We Here?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard # cards, where # is equal to the number of cards with the word 'hell' in the title in your opponent's Ring area. Your opponent discards# cards, where # is equal to the number of cards with the word 'hell' in the title in your Ring area. When played in Indianopolis, IN at GenCon, you may shuffle 1 card from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, if your opponent does not win the game by the end of his third turn from now, he may discard his hand. If he does not, he puts all cards from his Ring area into his Ringside pile. End your turn. As a reversal, this card is -10f, reverse and Active, Unique or Super-star specific card and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have a card in your Ring area with a Survivor Series logo and a card in your Ring area without a Survivor Series logo. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then remove any number of cards in your Ringside pile from the game and then shuffle up to the same number of cards with a Survivor Series logo from your Ringside pile into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, when your opponent reverses a maneuver from his hand and your Fortitude Rating is less than his Fortitude Rating, look at his hand, choose 1 card, and he discards the chosen card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for any number of non-unique cards with the words 'cheap pop' in the title, put them into your Ringside pile, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and put 1 card with the words 'cheap pop' in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for any number of non-unique cards wuth the word 'hell' in the title, put them into your Ringside pile, and shuffle your Arsenal. When this ard is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and put 1 card with he word 'hell' in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand.

card.name: Four Years in the Making: Survivor Series 3

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have 4 or more cards in your hand. Discard your hand, then put up to 3 cards from your Ringside pile on top of your Arsenal, then search your Arsenal for up to 3 cards with the Survivor Series logo, reveal them to your opponent, put them into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when your Fortitude Rating is less than your opponent's Fortitude Rating. Put 1 Maneuver card from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile. When this card is in your Ring area, if your opponent reverses a maneuver from his hand, you may put this card into your Ringside pile, search your Arsenal for 1 Maneuver card with Stun Value, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Starting Hand Size is +1. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then put 1 card with the word 'cheap'in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent's Starting Hand Size is -1. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then put 1 card with the word 'hell'in the title from your Ringside pile into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Name Face, Heel, Raw, SmackDown!, Chain, Heat, Throwback, or Volley. Your opponent searches his Arsenal for 1 card of the named type, reveals it to you, puts it into his hand, and shuffles his Arsenal. Then search your Arsenal for 1 card of the named type, reveal it to him, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Before every Draw Segment, all players overturn 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When this card is in your Ring area, during your turn you may put this card into your Ringside pile and then remove any number of cards in your Ringside pile from the game and draw 4 cards for every 7 cards removed in this way.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When your opponent reverses a maneuver from his hand, you may look at his hand, choose 1 card, and remove the chosen card from the game. Once during each of your turns you may discard 1 card and then search your Arsenal for 1 card with the word 'maintain' in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Once any player has played a non-Superstar-specific card that is a Feud, Stipulation, Manager or Object, that player cannot play any non-Superstar-specific cards of those types during the Pre-match phase.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when your Superstar Value is less than your opponent's Superstar Value. Put cards from your opponent's Ring area into his Ringside pile equal to the number of cards in your Ring area with the words 'cheap pop' in the title +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when played by Stone Cold Steve Austin or The Rattlesnake. Remove all cards in your hand from the game and put all cards in your Ringside pile into your hand. During your next turn, before your Draw Segment, discard your hand and then put cards from your Ringside pile into your hand equal to the number of cards in your Ring area with the word 'hell' in the title.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique card that has four or more lines of printed card text and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may pack cards with the Triple H or Shawn Michaels logo, but you do not count as those Superstars. At the end of your Pre-match phase, you may discard 2 cards and then search your Arsenal for 1 card with exactly 2 words in the title, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your opponent reverses a non-Extreme Mean from his hand or Backlash: he overturns 4 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Your Factions have your Superstar logo. All players draw up to 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can be packed by Funaki. As a maneuver, when your opponent successfully played a non-maneuver card last turn and this is the first card played on your turn, can only be reversed from Arsenal. As a reversal, if you remove random cards in your Ringside from the game equal to the Fortitude of his card +1, reverse any non-Superstar-specific non-maneuver card; or when he has a non-Superstar-specific Corner in his Ring, reverse any non-maneuver card. During your next turn, you can only play maneuvers or Set-up cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When you are William Regal, The Mystery Wrestler, a Chairman, or a GM, this card is Multi. Look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 reversal card, and he discards the chosen card. When you have lower Fortitude, you may discard 1 card and choose 2 reversal cards instead. When played in Indianapolis, IN at GenCon, do not discard for this card.

card.name: Where The HELL Did Everyone Go?!?!?

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Remove any number of cards with 'hell' in the title in your Ring from the game; for every 2 cards with 'hell' in the title removed, remove 1 card in your opponent's Ring from the game. When played in Indianapolis, IN at GenCon, this card is -5F; when successfully played, you may shuffle up to # cards from your Ringside or removed from the game into your Arsenal, where # is the number of cards he removes from the game.

card.name: Victim of the Revolving Cheap Pop

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Shuffle any number of cards with 'cheap pop' in the title from your Ring and/or Ringside into your Arsenal; your opponent removes the top # cards of his Arsenal from the game, where # is equal to half the number of cards shuffled in, rounded down. When played in Columbus, OH at Origins, this card is -5F and you may draw up to # cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Legend. When packing this card, it is also considered to be Managed by 'The Mouth of the South' Jimmy Hart. ACE: You may put this card into your Ringside to reverse any non-Unique maneuver. When this card is in your Ringside, you may remove this card from the game to reverse any non-Unique maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When overturned, completely reverse any card (even if it cannot be reversed) or any card effect and remove this card from the game.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have a Title Belt card in your Ring area. Your Pre-match Capacity is +2, and your Mid-match Capacity is +1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any non-unique card that has four or more lines of printed card text and end your opponent's turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after your opponent plays a card that he has modified by other cards. Disregard all modifications made to that card by other cards until the end of the turn. You may still play Reversal cards to that card, and he draws 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for any number of non-unique cards with 'cheap pop' in the title, put them into your Ringside, and shuffle. Your opponent draws up to 1 card. ACE: During your turn, you may put this card into your Ringside and then put 1 card with 'cheap pop' in the title from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to # cards from your Ringside into your hand, where # is the number of cards in your Ring with 'cheap pop' in the title. Your opponent puts up to # cards from his Ringside into his hand, where # is the number of cards in his Ring with 'cheap pop' in the title. When played at Columbus, OH at Origins, all players shuffle up to 1 card from their Ringside into their Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when Really Going for a Cheap Pop is in your Ring. Look at your opponent's Backlash. When played at Columbus, OH at Origins, he discards 1 card. When this card is in your Ring, he must discard 1 card to play a card with 'cheap' in the title.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Requirement: Revolution ECW Originals in your Ring. When this card reverses from Arsenal: put this card into your Ring and you have 4 or more Superstar-specifics from 'ECW Originals' Faction Members and/or cards with 'ECW Originals' in the text in your Ring, you may discard 1 Reversal: put up to 1 Pre-match Event from his Ring into his Ringside and end his turn.

card.name: Really Going for a Cheap Pop

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Discard up to 2 cards and draw the same number of cards. When played at Columbus, OH at Origins, you may discard up to 3 cards.

card.name: Revolution Four Now Go, Cat Go!

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Draw up to 4 cards, then discard 1 card. When Revolution One for the Money..., Revolution Two For the Show..., and Revolution Three to Get Ready... are in your Ring, your opponent cannot play Antics.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: The reversed card goes into your opponent's Ring instead of his Ringside: blank its text and Damage until the end of the turn. During his turn when this card is overturned: you may put this card into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for up to 1 card with Requirement: Faction, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle your Arsenal. Discard 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Put up to 2 cards from your Ringside on the bottom of your Arsenal.

property.name: CardType
property.value: Reversal: Card with Exactly 2 Words in the Title

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any card with exactly 2 words in the title. During your opponent's turn if this card is overturned: you may put this card into your Ring. When the card or effect is not reversed, resume overturning and then end his turn; he draws 1 card.

card.name: Pop the Guy On the Apron

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played as an inactive player of your team and when one of your opponents has Cheap Shot From the Corner, Trip, Partner Interference, That's Gonna Cost You!, Double Team, Propel Partner or Jump the Bell in his Ring. Only your inactive opponent can reverse this maneuver; if he does, your active partner's turn ends and you overturn 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As a maneuver, when successfully played you may overturn 1 card and 'tag out'. As an action, you may discard this card and draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played as an inactive partner after your active partner successfully plays a 5D+ maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played against an inactive opponent. Reversals to this card are +4F.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when your opponent cannot play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts, when he has a Manager card in his Ring, or when this is a Tag Team format match. As a reversal, when you have lower Fortitude, reverse any action if it is not the first action played this turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing Tandem Atomic Drop. When successfully played, a single inactive partner must discard 1 card and after damage is resolved, he may 'tag in.'

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When successfully played, a single inactive partner must discard 1 card and after damage is resolved, he may 'tag in.'

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed when you cannot play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts, or if this is a Tag Team format match. As a maneuver, can only be played after a successfully played 5D+ maneuver or Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle. As a reversal, reverse Superplex or From the Top Rope. When successfully played, opponent puts 2 cards from hand on top of his Arsenal. This card is -7F when you are the Dudley Boyz or Edge and Christian.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played 4D+ maneuver. When played, an inactive partner may discard 1 6D+ maneuver and this card is +#D, where # is the Damage of the discarded maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed when you cannot play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts, or if this is a Tag Team format match. Choose 1 card in your Ringside, put it on top of your Arsenal, search your Arsenal for any 1 Action, reveal it, put it into your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Reverse any 8D+ Strike or 8D+ High Risk. This card is +#D, where # is equal to the reversed maneuver's Damage -1.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played from your hand by an inactive partner, reverse any maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: When played from your hand by an inactive partner, reverse any Strike, Grapple, or High Risk.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played by an inactive partner. Cannot be reversed when you have lower Fortitude. As an action, 'tag in.' As a reversal, reverse any non-Unique Set-up card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have at least 10 lower Fortitude. Cannot be reversed. As an action, 'tag out.' As a reversal, reverse any maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: You may 'tag out', draw up to 1 card and overturn 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played by an inactive partner when you have lower Fortitude. The active partner either puts 1 card from his Ringside into his hand, or he shuffles up to 3 cards from his Ringside into his Arsenal and overturns 1 card. ACE: During your turn, you may put this card into your Ringside and when your next card played this turn is an action, it cannot be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played by an inactive partner after a successfully played maneuver by your active partner. When your active partner's next card played this turn is a Strike or Grapple, it is a High Risk instead and +3D. Draw 1 card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing Double Team. Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver. An inactive partner may now play 1 maneuver against your active opponent, and it is +5D.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed when you cannot play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts, or if this is a Tag Team format match. Choose one: your opponent's reversals to your next maneuver played this turn are +# F, where # is equal to your Fortitude Rating -1; OR you may discard this card and draw up to 3 cards.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All opponents discard 1 card, and all opponents' reversals to your next maneuver this turn are +15F. When played by Edge and/or Christian this card can not be reversed.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be packed when packing Give and Take. At the end of the Pre-match phase, one member of your team discards any number of cards and another member of the team draws 1 card for every 2 discarded.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed when you cannot play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts, or if this is a Tag Team format match. ACE: During your turn, you may put this card into your Ringside, and then shuffle up to 5 cards from your Ringside into your Arsenal and put 1 Face card from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed when you cannot play any title belt except the Tag Team Title Belts, or if this is a Tag Team format match. Reverse any Strike or Grapple, and overturn cards until you overturn 2 cards with the Tag logo.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: As an action, can only be played when you have lower Fortitude; discard this card and 'tag out.' As a reversal, when your opponents have at least 6 more non-Pre-match cards in their Ring than you have in your Ring, completely reverse any non-unique card and 'tag out.'

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played when you have greater Fortitude. You may 'tag out.'

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played after a successfully played maneuver or Throw Into the Corner Turnbuckle. Your active opponent cannot 'tag out' for the rest of this turn and during his next turn.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be played as an inactive partner. Search your Arsenal for any Tag card, reveal it, put it in your hand, and shuffle.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Cannot be reversed when Where the Hell Are We? is in your Ring. Put 1 Backlash card from your Ringside into your Backlash and then overturn 1 card unless played in Indianapolis, IN at Gen Con. When this card is in your Ring, your opponent cannot play any card with 'why' in the title.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All players draw up to 2 cards. When played in Indianapolis, IN at Gen Con, all players draw up to 3 cards instead.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Search your Arsenal for any number of non-unique cards with 'hell' in the title, put them into your Ringside, and shuffle. Your opponent draws up to 1 card. ACE: During your turn, you may put this card into your Ringside and then put 1 card with 'hell' in the title from your Ringside into your hand.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: # cannot be greater than 4. Discard # cards, where # is equal to the number of cards with 'hell' in the title in your opponent's Ring. He discards # cards, where # is equal to the number of cards with 'hell' in the title in your Ring. When played in Indianapolis, IN at GenCon, shuffle up to 1 card from your Ringside into your Arsenal.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Legend. When packing this card, you cannot pack 'Cowboy' Bob Orton Interferes. Reverse any non-Unique card.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: Can only be packed by a Legend. When packing this card, you cannot pack In My Day, a Maneuver Was a Maneuver. As an action, choose up to 3 non-hybrid non-multi Maneuver cards in your Ringside, randomly shuffle 1 into your Arsenal, and put the rest into your hand. As a reversal, completely reverse any hybrid maneuver or Multi maneuver.

property.name: Card Text
property.value: All players' Calling You Out, First of All, Throwback Inferno Match, It's All About the Game, Piper's Pit, non-Throwback Premiere WWF Superstar, Run the Gauntlet, and Yo! Kill da Beat! are blank. When any player has 4- Hand cards, they may overturn instead of discarding to reverse a Chain card. When a player would discard their Hand or Backlash for their opponent's effects, they can instead randomly discard # (# = half their Hand cards, rounded down). No player can continue their turn more than 3 times or continue the game more than once.
